metadata.title: CVE-2020-15117 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Synergy before version 1.12.0, a Synergy server can be crashed byreceiving a kMsgHelloBack packet with a client name length set to0xffffffff (4294967295) if the servers memory is less than 4 GB. It wasverified that this issue does not cause a crash through the exceptionhandler if the available memory of the Server is more than 4GB.

criterions.comment: synergy package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
